problems.title: Palindrome Number
problems.description: Given an integer x, return true if x is a palindrome, and false otherwise.

problems.title: Reverse Integer
problems.description: Given a signed 32-bit integer x, return x with its digits reversed. If reversing x causes the value to go outside the signed 32-bit integer range [-231, 231 - 1], then return 0. Assume the environment does not allow you to store 64-bit integers (signed or unsigned).
problems.top_solution:
cpp // pop operation: pop = x % 10; x /= 10; // push operation: temp = rev * 10 + pop; rev = temp;

module.exports = { solution };
